name: Airship (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 9 miles per hour (216 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of its elemental engine, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Airship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -20 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (air): elemental power, speed 80 ft. If the engine is destroyed, the ship immediately crashes.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2
